title.narrative: Public Diplomacy and Outreach in India and in the SAARC

description.narrative: The general objective of the action is to deepen the political, economic and cultural relationships of the EU with India and SAARC on account of the Unions strategic interest in promoting those relationships and for making the EU more relevant as a global actor in all areas covered by the EU's Common Foreign and Security Policy (CFSP) strategy with Asia and other relevant key EU strategies that have also an external action dimension.

European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)

organisation.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to India

department.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to India

description.narrative: Europe, India and other SAARC Member States

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management

title.narrative: EU Public Diplomacy and Outreach in India and in the SAARC
Extent to which the cultural activities organized by the project have contributed to the cultural diplomacy efforts and visibility of the European Union in India

description.narrative: Extent to which the cultural activities organized by the project have contributed to the cultural diplomacy efforts and visibility of the European Union in India

title.narrative: Extent to which the cultural activities organized by the project have contributed to the cultural diplomacy efforts and visibility of the European Union in India

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

baseline.value: The EU-India Joint Action Plan (JAP) needs to focus on promoting four priorities, one of them being cultural exchanges

comment.narrative: The EU-India Joint Action Plan (JAP) needs to focus on promoting four priorities, one of them being cultural exchanges

actual.value: The promotion of EU culture by the way of the Opera and classical music expanded the visibility of the EU in India among the audiences who have been exposed to the work of The Neemrana Music Foundation

title.narrative: Extent to which the higher education-related activities organized by project have contributed to raising the profile and visibility of the European Union in the Indian higher education sector

description.narrative: Extent to which the higher education-related activities organized by project have contributed to raising the profile and visibility of the European Union in the Indian higher education sector

title.narrative: Extent to which the higher education-related activities organized by project have contributed to raising the profile and visibility of the European Union in the Indian higher education sector

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

baseline.value: The EU-India Joint Action Plan (JAP) needs to focus on promoting four priorities, one of them being people-to-people and cultural exchanges, including Higher Education related activities

comment.narrative: The EU-India Joint Action Plan (JAP) needs to focus on promoting four priorities, one of them being people-to-people and cultural exchanges, including Higher Education related activities

actual.value: Interest for HE in Europe was raised among Indian students, professors and Higher Education institutes

title.narrative: Extent to which the recognition of the EU as a credible contributor among South Asian Association for Regional Cooperation (SAARC) was raised

description.narrative: Extent to which the recognition of the EU as a credible contributor among South Asian Association for Regional Cooperation (SAARC) was raised

title.narrative: Extent to which the recognition of the EU as a credible contributor among South Asian Association for Regional Cooperation (SAARC) was raised

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

baseline.value: EU has had an observer status in SAARC since 2006 but lacks recognition as a credible contributor among SAARC members states

comment.narrative: EU has had an observer status in SAARC since 2006 but lacks recognition as a credible contributor among SAARC members states

actual.value: The EU has gained recognition as a credible contributor among SAARC member states to the extent that bilateral and regional cooperation partnerships have been enhanced and established and processes of global and mutual concerns are better influenced by the EU.

baseline.value: Indian media and think tanks have an insufficient information on EU positions on key global and bilateral issues

actual.value: visibility and influence of the EU increased among media personnel and think tanks professionals
